title: [求助]Mac上的MC如何安装中文输入补丁？
author: 我爱慕紫越

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
~/Library/Application Support/Minecraft/bin/minecraft.jar

补丁打入这个文件

这与启动器无关
